name: etl_version
description: The version of pipeline used to generate CDR

name: ehr_source
description: EHR dataset used to generate cdr

name: ehr_cutoff_date
description: The Cutoff date for the ehr_submissions

name: rdr_source
description: RDR dataset used to generate cdr

name: rdr_export_date
description: Date RDR export is handed over to curation team

name: cdr_generation_date
description: The date for which the source data are most current, such as the day the cdr pipeline is initiated.

name: qa_handoff_date
description: The date on which the CDR is being handed over to the QA team for QA

name: vocabulary_version
description: The version of the vocabulary used
